item.title: Intro
item.description: Me I’m just a computer science guy that likes graphics and music. This Blog This blog was created mostly to kill some time and write some stuff, so I don’t really expect to get attention or many readers. Most posts here will probably be about computer graphics or any other thing I get interested in. The Content I don’t know man, interesting stuff to you, I hope.
item.content:
Me

I’m just a computer science guy that likes graphics and music.

This Blog

This blog was created mostly to kill some time and write some stuff, so I don’t really expect to get attention or many readers. Most posts here will probably be about computer graphics or any other thing I get interested in.

The Content

I don’t know man, interesting stuff to you, I hope.
